# `ChangeEmailEvents`

```ts
type ChangeEmailEvents =
  | { type: 'REQUEST'; email: string; options: ChangeEmailOptions }
  | { type: 'SUCCESS' }
  | { type: 'ERROR'; error: ErrorPayload | null }
```
